caption: T: Use a number bond to decompose 7 4 into the whole and some parts.
exif: {"Image DocumentName": "T: Use a number bond to decompose 7 4 into the whole and some parts.", "Image ImageDescription": "BRIDGING THE LANGUAGE GAP (MATH) Problem 4: Decompose to record (or write down) a sum greater than 1 as a mixed number = minutes. Facilitation Notes: T: (Display 5 fourths + 2 fourths.) Solve in unit form, and write a number sentence using fractions. S: 7 fourths = 7 4. T: Use a number bond to decompose 7 4 into the whole and some parts. Students draw number bond as pictured . T: 4 4 is the same as\u2026 S: 1 whole.
